description:
** INTRODUCTORY PRICE FOR A LIMITED TIME **

WEBOS 2.0 Ready!

If you use the DC Metro you'll want this app. 

Find the nearest Metro Station from your location. See the Metro lines at that stop. No Internet connection required. 

** Get the time to the next Metro at your stop
 & 
a direct link to Google Maps  with directions to that Metro station from your present location (Internet connection required). **

Links directly to TMaps - DC FREE DC transit map application to get official DC wmta maps on your phone with no internet connection. *** 

Bonus 
*** Includes over 50 DC attractions and the closest metro to those attractions. 

*** DOUBLE BONUS *** 
Includes over 16 DC Colleges. If you live, work, go to school or occasionally visit DC, you'll be glad you have this app on your phone. Easy to use and very convenient.

*** Triple Bonus
 - Tourist Map of Major Sites
 - DC Weather
 - Favorite Stations
versionNote: Time to next train reload button added.
